title: kAmattai jayikkAdavan
sahitya:
kAmattai jayikkaAdavan kalvi pAzh shelvam pAzh koDiya


anupallavi

  rAma dhyAnam tannilum shiva nAma bhajanam tannilum
nEmattai viDAdavan dinam eri hOmattai viDAdavan eninum


caraNam    dishai paravu pugazh eidiDinum innishai amuda mazhai peidiDinum
 EkA
dashi vratam japa tapangaLoDu aLavil dAna dharmangaL sheidiDinum
